name: 4 Privet Drive
effect:
Effect: Your opponent can't play Spell cards.
To Solve: Your opponent chooses 6 cards in his or her hand and discards them.
Opponent's Reward: Your opponent may draw a card.

name: Accio
effect: Put up to 2 Lesson cards from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Alchemy
effect: Search your deck. You may take up to 2 Lesson cards from your deck, show them to your opponent, and put them in your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Apothecary
effect: To play this card, discard 2 other cards from your hand. You may take a card that needs P Power from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Apparate
effect: Discard the Adventure your opponent has played. You don't get the reward.

name: Avifors
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's F Lessons in play and discard it.

name: Baby Dragon
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your F Lessons from play.

name: Baubillious
effect: Do 1 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice. Then draw a card.

name: Bluebell Flames
effect: Do 4 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

name: Boil Cure
effect: Put up to 4 non-Healing cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck (in any order).

name: Borrowed Wand
effect:
Provides 2C
If you play this card, and you already have a Wand in play, discard the old one.

name: Burning Bitterroot Balm
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your P Lessons from play. Shuffle up to 10 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Cage
effect:
Provides 1F
During your turn, you may discard this card from play and use an Action to choose a Creature in play (yours or your opponent's) and return it to it's owner's hand.

name: Care of Magical Creatures
effect: Provides 1F

name: Cauldron to Sieve
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's P Lessons in play and discard it.

name: Charms
effect: Provides 1C

name: Confundus
effect: Your opponent chooses 2 cards in his or her hand and discards them (1 if he or she only has 1).

name: Dean Thomas
effect:
Wizard/Gryffindor/Unique
Once per game, draw 3 cards.

name: Delivery Owl
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your F lessons from play. Before each of your turns, draw a card.

name: Diagon Alley
effect:
Effect: Your opponent can't use Actions to draw cards.
To Solve: Your opponent skips a total of 7 Actions. (Those Actions don't need to be one right after the other.)
Opponent's Reward: Your opponent may draw any number of cards.

name: Dogbreath Potion
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your P Lessons from play. Do 8 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

name: Draco Malfoy
effect:
Wizard/Slytherin/Unique
During your turn, you may use an action and discard a card from your hand to look at your opponent's hand. You may then choose one card in his or her hand and discard it.

name: Draco Malfoy
effect:
Wizard/Slytherin/Unique
During your turn, you may use an action and discard a card from your hand to look at your opponent's hand. You may then choose one card in his or her hand and discard it.

name: Draco Malfoy
effect:
Wizard/Slytherin/Unique

During your turn, you may use an action and discard a card from your hand to look at your opponent's hand. You may then choose one card in his or her hand and discard it.

name: Draco's Trick
effect: Discard the Adventure you've played. You get the reward.

name: Dragon Heart Wand
effect:
Provides 3C
Play this card only if you have cards in play that provides at least 2 C Power. If you play this card, and you already have a Wand in play, discard the old one.

name: Dragon's Escape
effect:
Effect: Before each of your turns, your opponent takes 1 damage.
To Solve: Your opponent chooses 3 of his or her Lessons in play and discard them.
Opponent's Reward: Your opponent draws 3 cards or does 3 damage to you.

name: Draught of Living Death
effect: To play this card, discard 2 of your P Lessons from play. Do 12 damage to your opponent or to a creature of your choice.

name: Dungbomb
effect: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to you by your opponent's Adventures and Creatures.

name: Elixir of Life
effect: To play this card, discard 2 of your P Lessons from play. Shuffle up to 16 Non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Epoximise
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's C Lessons in play and discard it.

name: Erumpent Potion
effect: Do 1 damage to your opponent or to a creature of your choice.

name: Fluffy Falls Asleep
effect: Choose a Creature in play and return it to its owner's hand.

name: Forest Troll
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your F Lessons from play.

name: Forgetfulness Potion
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your P Lessons from play. During your opponent's next turn, he or she can't play cards.

name: Foul Brew
effect: Do 2 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

name: Fumos
effect: Do 2 damage to each Creature (even your own).

name: Giant Tarantula
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your F Lessons from play.

name: Gringotts Cart Ride
effect:
Effect: Before each of your opponent's turns, he or she chooses a card in his or her hand (if any) and discards it.
To Solve: Your opponent skips a total of 5 Actions. (Those Actions don't have to be one right after the other.)
Opponent's Reward: Your opponent may draw 5 cards.

name: Hagrid and the Stranger
effect: Put a Creature card from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Hannah Abbott
effect:
Witch/Hufflepuff/Unique
Once per game, you may trade 2 cards in your hand for 2 non-Healing cards in your discard pile.

name: Harry Hunting
effect:
Effect: Your opponent's Creature and Spell cards need 2 more Power to play.
To Solve: Your opponent chooses 7 cards in his or her hand and discards them.
Opponent's Reward: Your opponent may put a lesson card from his or her discard pile into play.

name: Harry Potter
effect:
Wizard/Gryffindor/Unique
Whenever you use an Action to draw a card, you may draw 2 cards instead of 1.

name: Hermione Granger
effect:
Witch/Gryffindor/Unique
If you already have 2 or more lessons in play, then whenever you use an action to play a lesson card, you may play 2 lesson cards instead of one.

name: Hermione Granger
effect:
Witch/Gryffindor/Unique
If you already have 2 or more lessons in play, then whenever you use an action to play a lesson card, you may play 2 lesson cards instead of one.

name: Hermione Granger
effect:
Witch/Gryffindor/Unique
If you already have 2 or more lessons in play, then whenever you use an action to play a lesson card, you may play 2 lesson cards instead of one.

name: Hiding From Snape
effect:
Effect: Your opponent can't play Item cards.
To Solve: Your opponent chooses 4 Item cards in his or her hand and discards them.
Opponent's Reward: Your opponent may search his or her deck for any card and put it into his or her hand. Then your opponent shuffles his or her deck.

name: History of Magic
effect: Look at your opponent's hand. Discard all Adventure cards from it.

name: Homework
effect: Put up to 2 Lesson cards from your hand into play.

name: Hospital Wing
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your P Lessons from play. Shuffle up to 8 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Human Chess Game
effect:
Effect: During each of your opponent's turns, he or she can play cards only if you played 1 or more cards on your previous turn.
To Solve: Your opponent chooses and discards 1 of his or her Characters in play (other than his or her starting character) or 8 cards from their hand.
Opponent's Reward: Your opponent may draw 3 cards.

name: Illegibilus
effect: Look at your opponent's hand. Choose 1 of those cards and discard it.

name: Incarcifors
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures in play and discard it.

name: Incendio
effect: Count the number of C lessons you have in play, Do that much damage to a creature of your choice.

name: Invisibility Cloak
effect:
Gryffindor/Unique
Once during each of your opponent's turns, you may prevent all damage done by a spell card.

name: Kelpie
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your F Lessons from play. Whenever a Spell card damages you, you may let Kelpie take that damage instead.

name: Logic Puzzle
effect: Discard the Adventure your opponent has played. You get the reward.

name: Lost Notes
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Items or Lessons in play and discard it.

name: Magical Mishap
effect: Do 3 damage to your opponent.

name: Malevolent Mixture
effect: To play this card, discard 2 of your P lessons from play. Do 10 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

name: Meet the Centaurs
effect:
Effect: Your opponent plays with his or her hand face up.
To Solve: Your opponent discards his or her hand. (Your opponent may do this even if his or her hand is empty.)
Opponent's Reward: You play with your hand face up for the rest of the game.

name: Mrs Norris
effect: Your opponent plays with his or her hand face up.

name: Mysterious Egg
effect: Search your deck. You may take a Creature card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Nearly Headless Nick
effect:
Gryffindor/Unique
Once per game, you may search your deck. When you do, you may take up to 2 Item cards from your deck, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Norbert
effect: To play this card, discard 2 of your F Lessons from play.

name: Noxious Poison
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your P Lessons from play. Do 5 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

name: Nurture
effect: Remove all damage counters from all of your Creatures.

name: Obliviate
effect: Your opponent discards his or her hand.

name: Ollivanders
effect: Put an Item card from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Out of the Woods
effect: Look at your opponent's hand. Discard all Creature cards from it.

name: Peeves Causes Trouble
effect:
Effect: Whenever your opponent draws 1 or more cards, he or she then takes 1 damage.
To Solve: Your opponent skips a total of 5 Actions. (Those Actions don't need to be one right after the other.)
Opponent's Reward: You take 3 damage.

name: Pet Rat
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your F Lessons from play.

name: Pet Toad
effect: Whenever a Spell card damages you, you may let Pet Toad take that damage instead.

Provides 3P
To play this card, discard 1 of your P Lessons from play.

effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your lessons from play. You get 2 more Actions this turn.

name: Pomfrey's Pick-Me-Up
effect: Put up to 3 non-Healing cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck (in any order). Then draw a card.

name: Potion Ingredients
effect: When a Spell card damages you, you may discard this card from play to prevent all of that damage.

name: Potions
effect: Provides 1P

name: Potions Exam
effect: Your opponent chooses 3 of his or her cards in play and discards them (if your opponent has fewer than 3 cards in play he or she discards them all). Your opponent may prevent this by discarding 1 of his or her P Lessons in play and discarding it.

Wizard/Ravenclaw/Unique
Provides 1C
Once per game, you may trade 2 cards in your hand for 1 card in your discard pile that needs C power.

Wizard/Slytherin/Unique
Provides 1P
Once per game, you may shuffle up to 7 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Raven to Writing Desk
effect: If your opponent has 2 or more Creatures in play, choose 1 of them and discard it.

name: Remembrall
effect: During your turn, you may use an Action to put a Lesson card from your discard pile into play.

name: Reptile House
effect:
Effect: Your opponent can't use more than 1 Action to play Lesson cards during each of his or her turns.
To Solve: Your opponent chooses 4 of his or her Lessons in play and discards them.
Opponent's Reward: Your opponent may draw a card.

name: Restricted Section
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's T Lessons in play and discard it.

name: Ron Weasley
effect:
Wizard/Gryffindor/Unique
Whenever you play a Character card, you use up 1 Action to play it instead of 2.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
effect: Whenever 1 of your creatures does 3 or more damage to your opponent, it does 2 more damage than it usually would.

name: Shrinking Potion
effect: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to you.

name: Silver Cauldron
effect:
Provides 5P
To play this card, discard 2 of your P Lessons from play.

name: Snape's Question
effect: Do 4 damage to your opponent. Your opponent may prevent this damage by showing you a P Lesson from his or her hand.

name: Snuffling Potion
effect: Next turn, whenever your opponent draws a card, he or she discards it instead of putting it into his or her hand.

name: Squiggle Quill
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Items in play and discard it.

name: Steelclaw
effect: All your creatures do damage to your opponent.

name: Stupefy
effect: Do 5 damage to your opponent.

name: Take Root
effect: Your opponent chooses 1 of his or her Creatures in play and discards it.

name: Titillando
effect: Do 3 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice. Then your opponent chooses 3 cards in his or her hand and discards them. (If there are fewer than 3 cards in your opponent's hand, he or she discards them all.)

name: Toe Biter
effect: Do 2 damage to your opponent. You may also choose a Creature and do 2 damage to it.

name: Transfiguration
effect: Provides 1T

name: Transfiguration Exam
effect: Discard all creatures from play (even your own).

name: Transfiguration Test
effect: If your opponent has 2 or more Creatures in play, he or she chooses 1 of them and discards the rest. Then, if you have 2 or more Creatures in play, choose 1 of them and discard the rest.

name: Transmogrify
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Creatures from play. Search your deck. You may take a Creature card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it in your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Troll in the Bathroom
effect:
Effect: Before each of your turns, your opponent takes 2 damage.
To Solve: Your opponent chooses 7 cards in his or her hand and discards them.
Opponent's Reward: You take 4 damage.

name: Unicorn
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your F lessons from play. You get 1 more Action on each of your turns (including the turn you play Unicorn).

name: Unusual Pets
effect:
Play this card only if your opponent has any Creatures in play.
Effect: Before each of your turns, your opponent takes 4 damage.
To Solve: Your opponent chooses 2 of his or her Creatures in play and discards them.
Opponent's Reward: Your opponent may draw a card.

name: Vanishing Glass
effect: Play this card only if your opponent has any Lessons in play. Choose 1 of those Lessons and discard it. Search your deck. You may take a Creature card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it in your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Vermillious
effect: Do 3 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

name: Wingardium Leviosa!
effect: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to you by your opponent's Creatures.

name: Winged Keys
effect: Once during each of your turns, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures in play. Prevent all damage done by that creature until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Wizard Crackers
effect: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Lesson card, put it into play. If it isn't, put the card in your hand.
